faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.desc: Here are some frequently asked questions about our product

question_1.question: What is AI Trip generator?
question_1.answer: AI Trip generator is a travel planning app that uses artificial intelligence to generate personalized travel experiences based on your preferences.

question_2.question: How does the trip generation process work?
question_2.answer: You start by filling out a short multi-step form with your travel preferences such as location, dates, number of people, interests, and intensity level. Based on this, our AI generates a personalized itinerary with attractions, estimated times, and costs.

question_3.question: Can I customize or edit the suggested trip?
question_3.answer: Yes! You can remove, rearrange, or replace attractions in your itinerary. Youâ€™ll also see them on an interactive map for easy planning.

question_4.question: Can I share my trip with friends or family?
question_4.answer: Absolutely. You can generate a shareable link or invite specific users to view and edit your trip plan collaboratively.

question_5.question: Does the AI include events like concerts or sports matches?
question_5.answer: If you select interests like entertainment or sports, the AI will try to include relevant events happening during your stay using external event APIs where available.

question_6.question: Does the app show estimated costs for the trip?
question_6.answer: Yes, the summary includes average costs for accommodation, meals, and entrance fees for attractions. This helps you plan your budget more effectively.

question_7.question: Will I get weather information for my travel dates?
question_7.answer: If your travel dates are within the next two weeks, the AI will show forecasted weather conditions for your destination to help you pack accordingly.

question_8.question: Can I save and access multiple trip plans?
question_8.answer: Yes, you can create, save, and manage multiple trip plans from your dashboard. This is perfect for comparing options or planning different parts of a longer journey.
